properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 2:42PM EST until February 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 knots tonight becoming southwest
Monday morning, and waves 3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY
